steps: Set SNMP poll interval and DHCP sniffing mode.
Add subnets and configure collectors for each subnet.
Start on-demand scan or wait for scheduled scans.
Navigate to Forward and Sync Endpoint Data.
Enter the FQDN or IP address of the target profiler.
Retrieve and enter the API key.
Save changes to start syncing data.

image_insights.insights: The Basic Configuration screen allows setting SNMP poll intervals, DHCP sniffing modes, and purging intervals.
The Subnets Configuration screen supports adding subnets, selecting collectors, and triggering on-demand scans.
The Forward and Sync Endpoint Data section allows entering API keys and syncing data between profilers.
The Device Discovery Report Table displays discovered devices with details like MAC address, IP address, and operating system.
The Predefined Antivirus Rule Configuration screen allows setting rule names, criteria, and associated products.
